00034 Double_t RooCruijff::evaluate() const{
00035   
00036   Double_t sigma, alpha;
00037   if(x < mean) {
00038     sigma=sigmaL;
00039     alpha=alphaL;
00040   } else {
00041     sigma = sigmaR;
00042     alpha = alphaR;
00043   }
00044   
00045   Double_t delta_x = x - mean;
00046   Double_t delta_x2 = delta_x * delta_x;
00047 
00048   return exp(- delta_x2 / (2 * sigma * sigma + alpha * delta_x2));
00049 }
